items.content_html: CopyData Function: A lightweight JavaScript utility to copy text from any element (ID or class) to the clipboard. Customize notifications, background colors, and more, with built-in error handling to ensure reliability in various scenarios.

items.content_html: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.

With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.
